amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase funding for the Keep Young Athletes Safe Act grant program by $2.5 million and reduces funding for salaries and expenses at the Department of Commerce by $2.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Burgess.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
